We will borrow some functions from fastai:

{% raw %}

load_image[source]

load_image(fn, mode=None)

Open and load a PIL.Image and convert to mode

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

show_image[source]

show_image(im, ax=None, figsize=None, title=None, **kwargs)

Show a PIL image on ax.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %}

show_images[source]

show_images(ims, nrows=1, ncols=None, titles=None, **kwargs)

Show all images ims as subplots with rows using titles.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
